value:
$WmMPID_フュリー,ch06_27_Fury_F_Normal,Face|Annand! My sister! It really is you...$k$p$WmMPID_マーニャ,ch06_26_Magna_F_Normal,Face|Oh, Erinys. I am so glad that we
have another chance to speak...$k$pAlthough you look much the same as
when I saw you last, your eyes shine
with determination.$k$pYes...you have matured. I am so
happy, Erinys.$k$p$WmMPID_フュリー,ch06_27_Fury_F_Normal,Face|Indeed I have! None will call me
"crybaby" anymore.$k$pI have strengthened the pride I carry
in my heart as a pegasus knight of
Silesse. I hope to one day match you.$k$pOf course, I still have a long way to
go... Oh, I swore never to cry again,
but the tears...they won't stop!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|To see two loving sisters reunited...
How wonderful! Your bond is so
strong.$k$pSpeaking of bonds, you two are
close—aren't you, Lex and Azelle?$k$p$WmMPID_レックス,ch06_29_Rex_M_Normal,Face|Sure, but no need for a teary-eyed
reunion here. We were fighting side
by side just before we arrived.$k$p$WmMPID_マーニャ,ch06_26_Magna_F_Normal,Face|The last thing I remember is falling
downward, toward Silesse... I could
feel the cold snow chill my skin.$k$pAfter that, I have no memory. It was
as if I was drifting endlessly in water...$k$p$WmMPID_フュリー,ch06_27_Fury_F_Normal,Face|Annand...$k$p$WmMPID_レックス,ch06_29_Rex_M_Normal,Face|Seems some power wanted to see
you two reunited, to be sure. And
we're happy to help, Princess.$k$p$WmMPID_マーニャ,ch06_26_Magna_F_Normal,Face|If I can wield this sword once more,
as a Hero, and support your people...
I would be glad to do so.$k$p$WmMPID_フュリー,ch06_27_Fury_F_Normal,Face|If I may join my sister in battle, I
have no objections.$k$pI will raise my lance for Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Thank you, all! We welcome you
and your aid!$k$p
